long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Password Generator Extension

Struggling with creating a new password? Let our Password Generator Extension for Chrome lend a hand! With a simple click, you can produce a robust password based on your selected criteria.

Features:

Opt for uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and symbols.
Easily adjust the desired length with a slider.
Real-time preview of the password length you've chosen.
Quick copy feature: Click on the generated password to copy it instantly to your clipboard.
Safe and local: Your password is generated on your device, ensuring total privacy.
Install now and generate secure passwords with ease!


密码生成器插件

还在为如何想新密码而烦恼吗？我们为Chrome开发的密码生成器插件来帮忙了！只需点击一下，就可以根据您选择的标准生成强大的密码。

特点：

可选择大写、小写、数字和符号。
通过滑块轻松调整所需的长度。
实时预览您选择的密码长度。
快速复制功能：点击生成的密码即可将其复制到剪贴板。
安全且本地化：您的密码在您的设备上生成，确保完全的隐私。
立即安装，轻松创建安全的密码，不再纠结！
